Section.Title: Use in Cancer
Section.Para: Nivolumab and relatlimab-rmbw is approved to treat:

ItemizedList.ListItem: Melanoma that is metastatic or cannot be removed by surgery. It is used in adults and children aged 12 years and older.

Section.Para: Nivolumab and relatlimab-rmbw is a combination form of nivolumab and relatlimab. This form may work better than either drug alone. For more information about nivolumab that may apply to this combination drug, see the Drug Information Summary for Nivolumab.
Nivolumab and relatlimab-rmbw is also being studied in the treatment of other types of cancer.
